body: T-this NTR is actually wholesome? Genuinely satisfied with the ending but could be a bit better

And "why? why? why?"...maybe because you've been cheating and he found out, hmm? And of course, she goes running back to the asswipe that "forced" her to do it. She could have joined the MC and the two girls(?) if she actually cared about him. She had NO right to be hurt after what she was complacent in. :/
What a stupid bitch. Fucking other dudes all the time...yet gets hurt that he's fucking girls. Hypocrite bitch. Fuck off! You should have remained faithful, whore.
